solution_line_template: The cow provides {total_milk_provided} cups of milk per day and the kids consume {kids_consumption_percent_value}% so they drink {total_milk_provided}*{kids_consumption_decimal} = <<{total_milk_provided}*{kids_consumption_decimal}={kids_consumed_milk}>>{kids_consumed_milk} cups of milk

The cow provides {total_milk_provided} cups of milk and the kids drink {kids_consumed_milk} cups leaving {total_milk_provided}-{kids_consumed_milk} = <<{total_milk_provided}-{kids_consumed_milk}={milk_after_kids}>>{milk_after_kids} cups of milk

Daisy uses {cooking_percent_value}% of the remaining {milk_after_kids} cups of milk to cook with so she uses {cooking_percent_decimal}*{milk_after_kids} = <<{cooking_percent_value}*{percent_factor}*{milk_after_kids}={milk_used_for_cooking}>>{milk_used_for_cooking} cups of milk

She had {milk_after_kids} cups of milk and used {milk_used_for_cooking} cups to cook with so that leaves {milk_after_kids}-{milk_used_for_cooking} = <<{milk_after_kids}-{milk_used_for_cooking}={milk_left_over}>>{milk_left_over} cups of milk
